title: Lakshmi Kasu Haram with Polki Diamonds and Emerald Accent
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features uncut Polki diamonds of VS clarity
and a central oval-cut Emerald of fine color. The 'kasu' are detailed gold coins.
features: This exquisite Kasu Haram showcases the traditional Lakshmi motif embedded into a filigree detailed heart pendant. The temple-inspired design with intricately crafted 'kasu' coins evokes a sense of timeless elegance. Detailed filigree heart shaped pendant and bead drops.
colors: Warm gold tone with brilliant white from the polki diamonds and a pop of rich green from the emerald. The hyderabadi polish give the gold a rich depth.
occasions: and other significant cultural celebrations. Can also be styled for upscale modern events.
description: A timeless heirloom piece that combines traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and emerald ensures lasting beauty and value. The Lakshmi motif signifies prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful addition to any jewelry collection. Unique and refined, this is a showcase of Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
